```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```



```{r}
rest_inspec = 
  p8105.datasets::rest_inspec |> 
  drop_na(grade, score) |> 
  filter(grade %in% c('A', 'B', 'C')) |> 
  mutate(
    year = year(inspection_date),
    month = year(inspection_date))
```



```{r}
rest_inspec$grade |> unique()
```

```{r}
rest_inspec$action |> unique()
```





```{r}
rest_inspec |> 
  filter(boro != 'Missing') |> 
  plot_ly(x = ~boro, y  = ~score, type = 'box')
```


```{r}
head(rest_inspec)
```
